lab.sectionSubtitle: Digital products demand absolute stability. Complex interactions, rendering limits, and new architecture patterns need robust testing in isolated R&D sprints. What proves itself under load here becomes the reliable standard for future client systems. No playgrounds. Only targeted validation.

fluidGeometry.problem: Abrupt UI state changes disrupt navigation flow, increase cognitive load, and signal poor product quality.
fluidGeometry.approach: Developing interpolated vector paths via Framer Motion & SVG, calculated off the main thread. Rendering stable 60fps animations that adapt to scroll velocity.
fluidGeometry.value: Frictionless visual feedback during critical micro-interactions (e.g., checkout or form validation), indirectly boosting user trust and time-on-site.

audioViz.problem: Web-based dashboards often collapse at the hardware level when rendering extremely dense, reactive data streams (audio, live analytics, tracking).
audioViz.approach: Offloading the render pipeline from the DOM directly to the GPU using WebGL/Canvas API and isolated Web Workers for data processing.
audioViz.value: Resilient architectures for data-heavy B2B interfaces that fluidly display complex live metrics without frame drops, even on low-power devices.
